GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.18.10
GSD.description:
mptcp: fix race on unaccepted mptcp sockets

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.10 by commit a8a3e95c74e48c2c9b07b81fafda9122993f2e12, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 86e39e04482b0aadf3ee3ed5fcf2d63816559d36. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mptcp: fix race on unaccepted mptcp sockets
